Из-за правил сообщества мне пришлось удалить пару деталей для публикации картинки. А так в файлах лежит оригинал. 🤫🔥


Due to the community rules, I had to delete a couple of parts to publish the picture. And so there is the original in the files. 🤫🔥

Hey hey fellas!
I've finally finished my 2nd hand-made usersight tailor-made for high tier tanks and the like with a stab and laser rangefinder. I am overall very proud of my fruits of my effort in making more usersights like this. More to come in the future!

The added bonus on the sight today is the logo from AC/DC. 😎😎

For the logo itself, the zip file has the JSON to modify the position, scale or add new lines and shapes into the AC/DC logo in this website called WTdraw:
https://solawk.github.io/wtdraw/

Can be used for all tanks, but its best used for high tier or top tier tanks...

Марин Китагава
Marin Kitagawa

один из моих сложных работ, хотел сделать версию без черных квадратов, но не прошел в лимит, пришлось делать так (1-3 по увеличению), если кто-то хочет работу лично для себя, пишите в дс: ra3n00

I guess that's good
